Test Description: Testing basic game understanding and rule understanding.
Question: What is the total number of points the blue player has in the given game state?
Rationale: In the given game state, the blue player already has 1 city, and 1 settlement on the board. Also the resource pool of the blue player contains 4 grain, 1 lumber, 1 brick, 1 wool, and 3 ore resource cards. The blue player also has 2 development cards (1 card having knight, 1 year of plenty).the blue player currently has 3 victory points (1 from settlement + 2 from city).
